summary: This book gives basic advice on dealing with the coronavirus COVID 19

12.pkb: Vya lombolo MOJA d’oku ambadyo kwafed’ekanani umanye  kuhusu e bifa ambayo virusi vya ug’onjo wa korona
12.en: There's only ONE thing ﻿you need to understand about how a coronavirus

13.pkb: Vya lombolo MOJA d’oku ambadyo kwafed’ekanani umanye  kuhusu e bifa ambayo virusi vya ug’onjo wa korona
13.en: There's only ONE thing ﻿you need to understand about how a coronavirus

28.pkb: E virusi avyo vyaddach’aa kona e mahwente yano

29.pkb: E virusi avyo vyaddach’aa kona e mahwente yano

30.pkb: Kaiya kuwe. Mita mbili zakuwezesha usepata mahwente makuyu
30.en: Keep your distance.﻿2m to 0.5m will keep you safe from large droplets.

31.pkb: Kaiya kuwe. Mita mbili zakuwezesha usepata mahwente makuyu
31.en: Keep your distance.﻿2m to 0.5m will keep you safe from large droplets.

38.pkb: Ddubha kona kuona muntu kakololani/kabigani myasa/ni mug’onjo unaweza ukaamua ku:
38.en: So if you see someone who is visibly coughing/sneezing/sick you can choose to:

39.pkb: Ddubha kona kuona muntu kakololani/kabigani myasa/ni mug’onjo unaweza ukaamua ku:
39.en: So if you see someone who is visibly coughing/sneezing/sick you can choose to:

40.pkb: Waphe kib’aiko kya kukingiliza e mpuya ne miyomo. Waweza kukolola au kubiga myasa mude mwe kib’aiko na wawakinge wade wotte waiyo hafuphi nao
40.en: Give them a mask.﻿They can cough or sneeze in it and protects everyone else nearby

41.pkb: Waphe kib’aiko kya kukingiliza e mpuya ne miyomo. Waweza kukolola au kubiga myasa mude mwe kib’aiko na wawakinge wade wotte waiyo hafuphi nao
41.en: Give them a mask.﻿They can cough or sneeze in it and protects everyone else nearby

48.en: Maybe she's not sick, just protecting herself

49.en: Maybe she's not sick, just protecting herself

50.pkb: Wantu ambao wakiziywa e ug’onjo ao waweza kuseyagiza d’alili zidezonchi, amo amale waweza kukizia wantu wangine.
50.en: People who are infected can show no symptoms, but are still﻿infectious

51.pkb: Wantu ambao wakiziywa e ug’onjo ao waweza kuseyagiza d’alili zidezonchi, amo amale waweza kukizia wantu wangine.
51.en: People who are infected can show no symptoms, but are still﻿infectious

52.pkb: Na kwa j’umula, ni vijure zaid’i kujifyula na ttutta ya wantu, koro nkuji kwamba aiye mug’onjo ni ga.
52.en: And in general, it's a good idea to avoid crowds, because you don't know who might be sick.

53.pkb: Na kwa j’umula, ni vijure zaid’i kujifyula na ttutta ya wantu, koro nkuji kwamba aiye mug’onjo ni ga.
53.en: And in general, it's a good idea to avoid crowds, because you don't know who might be sick.

54.pkb: Vijihi vya kuyavia uchafu wa magego

55.pkb: Vijihi vya kuyavia uchafu wa magego

60.pkb: Vifod’onko ambavyo vyaminywa ili wantu waphae juyu na ngazi ya sitima

61.pkb: Vifod’onko ambavyo vyaminywa ili wantu waphae juyu na ngazi ya sitima

68.pkb: Na hatta battini ye kib’aiko kyako kye uso
68.en: & even on the outside of your face mask

69.pkb: Na hatta battini ye kib’aiko kyako kye uso
69.en: & even on the outside of your face mask

70.pkb: Nguzo za ngazi kona kwaphayani d’arini

71.pkb: Nguzo za ngazi kona kwaphayani d’arini

72.pkb: bifa ya mpanya kyatumika kwa kompyuta

73.pkb: bifa ya mpanya kyatumika kwa kompyuta

80.pkb: Cha javyavyo, saa zingine mahe ya muntu mug’onjo yaweza kufikia  visaga vingine…
80.en: However, sometimes a sick person's saliva can get on other things…

81.pkb: Cha javyavyo, saa zingine mahe ya muntu mug’onjo yaweza kufikia  visaga vingine…
81.en: However, sometimes a sick person's saliva can get on other things…

84.pkb: au e uso wa yude umujamiyeo

85.pkb: au e uso wa yude umujamiyeo

88.pkb: Na kona kuddaba kisaga kimoja kahi ya avyo b’ila ya kumanya, kisa ujiddabe e uso,
88.en: And if you do touch any of these things by accident, and then touch your face,

89.pkb: Na kona kuddaba kisaga kimoja kahi ya avyo b’ila ya kumanya, kisa ujiddabe e uso,
89.en: And if you do touch any of these things by accident, and then touch your face,

90.pkb: avyo ni kuvikosa uviyavye na sab’uni, ddawa ya kuyaga viini vya mag’onjo au utumie ddawa iiyo na tembo.
90.en: and the only effective way to get rid of them is to wash them off with soap, bleach, or alcohol.

91.pkb: avyo ni kuvikosa uviyavye na sab’uni, ddawa ya kuyaga viini vya mag’onjo au utumie ddawa iiyo na tembo.
91.en: and the only effective way to get rid of them is to wash them off with soap, bleach, or alcohol.

92.pkb: Virusi vya uwezo wa kukaya rigo juyu ya visaga kwa masaa kachuchu
92.en: Viruses can last for quite a few hours on objects,

93.pkb: Virusi vya uwezo wa kukaya rigo juyu ya visaga kwa masaa kachuchu
93.en: Viruses can last for quite a few hours on objects,

98.pkb: Ndo maana ni vijure pia kuyuba e maag’izo yano
98.en: Which is why it is also good to follow these

99.pkb: Ndo maana ni vijure pia kuyuba e maag’izo yano
99.en: Which is why it is also good to follow these

100.en: wash with soap up to here

101.en: wash with soap up to here

106.pkb: Manya usejiddaba e uso. (Au uso wa yudeywonchi.) Kona ni haddi uuddabe, ikose nguzi e mikono yako na sab’uni, ikose na kuigagalia.
106.en: Do not touch your face. (Or anyone else's face.) If you have to, wash your hands with soap thoroughly first.

107.pkb: Manya usejiddaba e uso. (Au uso wa yudeywonchi.) Kona ni haddi uuddabe, ikose nguzi e mikono yako na sab’uni, ikose na kuigagalia.
107.en: Do not touch your face. (Or anyone else's face.) If you have to, wash your hands with soap thoroughly first.

108.pkb: Mala ya kwamba unaweza ukakwimba e wiya ude wa “Mwana Mujongosi” mara mbili
108.en: Enough time to sing “Happy Birthday” twice

109.pkb: Mala ya kwamba unaweza ukakwimba e wiya ude wa “Mwana Mujongosi” mara mbili
109.en: Enough time to sing “Happy Birthday” twice

116.pkb: Kosa e mongo we maganja yako
116.en: wash the back of your hands

117.pkb: Kosa e mongo we maganja yako
117.en: wash the back of your hands

120.pkb: Kona kuddaba, sijoj’ali. Awe kosa e mikono yako na sab’uni b’aad’a ya kuhenda ja avyo.
120.en: If you did, don't worry. Just wash your hands with soap after.

121.pkb: Kona kuddaba, sijoj’ali. Awe kosa e mikono yako na sab’uni b’aad’a ya kuhenda ja avyo.
121.en: If you did, don't worry. Just wash your hands with soap after.

122.pkb: Pia, manya kuddaba e battini ye kibaiko kyako kona unad’una.
122.en: Also, don't touch the outside of the mask if you can.

123.pkb: Pia, manya kuddaba e battini ye kibaiko kyako kona unad’una.
123.en: Also, don't touch the outside of the mask if you can.

126.pkb: Viini vya bakiteria ambavyo vyasab’ab’isha mag’onjo vyamea kizimu ye kib’aiko kyako kona kukivwaya kwa mud’a mulela sana
126.en: *Bacteria grows on the insides of your mask if you wear them too long

127.pkb: Viini vya bakiteria ambavyo vyasab’ab’isha mag’onjo vyamea kizimu ye kib’aiko kyako kona kukivwaya kwa mud’a mulela sana
127.en: *Bacteria grows on the insides of your mask if you wear them too long

128.pkb: Fattula e vib’aiko kona vikaya bifa zuka. Manya kuvivwaya zaid’i ya siku moja!
128.en: Throw away masks once they feel gross. Don't wear them for more than a day!

129.pkb: Fattula e vib’aiko kona vikaya bifa zuka. Manya kuvivwaya zaid’i ya siku moja!
129.en: Throw away masks once they feel gross. Don't wear them for more than a day!

138.pkb: Kila mumoja awe na tauli yakwe

139.pkb: Kila mumoja awe na tauli yakwe

140.pkb: Manya kudya sahani moja na muntu, au kutumia phamojani visaga vya jikoni, au kutumia tauli phamoja.
140.en: Do not share food, utensils, cups, towels.

141.pkb: Manya kudya sahani moja na muntu, au kutumia phamojani visaga vya jikoni, au kutumia tauli phamoja.
141.en: Do not share food, utensils, cups, towels.

142.pkb: Kuwezi kujiddaba e uso ne kikorhokorho kyako hatta kud’ema
142.en: You can't touch your face with your elbow even if you tried

143.pkb: Kuwezi kujiddaba e uso ne kikorhokorho kyako hatta kud’ema
143.en: You can't touch your face with your elbow even if you tried

144.pkb: Funga na kufunguya midyango ne vikorhokorho au vitturo vyako b’ad’ili ye mikono, kona yawezekana.
144.en: Open & close doors with your elbows or shoulders instead of hands, if possible.

145.pkb: Funga na kufunguya midyango ne vikorhokorho au vitturo vyako b’ad’ili ye mikono, kona yawezekana.
145.en: Open & close doors with your elbows or shoulders instead of hands, if possible.

148.pkb: Na b’aad’a ya kuyawa na bia ya wantu wangine
148.en: and after being out in the public

149.pkb: Na b’aad’a ya kuyawa na bia ya wantu wangine
149.en: and after being out in the public

152.pkb: Kosa e mikono yako na sab’uni saa zo badda chwe…
152.en: Always wash your hands with soap…

153.pkb: Kosa e mikono yako na sab’uni saa zo badda chwe…
153.en: Always wash your hands with soap…

164.pkb: Soma e vitab’u avyo upate maelezo zaid’i!
164.en: Read the articles for more tips!
